name: S_1_7_Manage_Surveys_on_the_Healthcare_Experience
title: S.1.7 Manage Surveys on the Healthcare Experience (Function)
description: Enable the PHR Account Holder to respond to surveys on his or her healthcare experience.
purpose: This feature would enable providers, payers and PHR Account Holders to assess and provide feedback on areas such as the perceivedÂ patient-centeredness of care, satisfaction and performance, and the transparency efforts to improve quality of care. The receipt of a health survey does not imply that the member must participate in the survey. The system may simply direct the PHR Account Holder to a separate, external survey tool, or may provide the capacity to manage the entire survey process in which a member chooses to participate.

statement.label: S.1.7#01
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to render notification to the PHR Account Holder that a survey is available.

statement.label: S.1.7#02
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability for the PHR Account Holder to manage participation in a survey (e.g., to subscribe or unsubscribe to a survey).

statement.label: S.1.7#03
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability to capture the results of PHR Account Holder survey responses from external survey tools.

statement.label: S.1.7#04
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability to manage one or more survey(s) that capture PHR Account Holder responses.

statement.label: S.1.7#05
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability to manage the survey results.
